text:
Many women will be advised 
to give birth in a consultant-
led hospital.
Your midwife can give you 
information to help you decide 
which hospital you want to 
have your baby in. If there is 
more than one hospital in your 
locality you can choose which 
one to go to. Find out more 
about the care provided in 
each so that you can decide 
which will suit you best.
General questions about 
midwife-led units and 
consultant-led units
Here are some of the questions 
that you might want to ask:
